description:
It's all about perspective. Simon Evans is sad that his recent break up has left him alone, but for best buddy Princeton Price, this is opportunity knocking. Princeton has been waiting for Simon to get out of his relationship and into Princeton's bed for some time, so when Simon confides in him, Princeton pounces, making his move on Simon. Simon had the only kind of thought about Princeton as a lover, but now that Princeton is here and clearly offering, suddenly the prospect seems more and more appealing. It doesn't hurt that Princeton is wielding a nice hard cock, ready to feed it to Simon. Simon will gladly eat his feelings on this one, and Princeton is more than happy to provide a serving of protein to go with that consoling. As Simon licks his lips, he forgets what he was even sad about in the first place.

Enjoy!
title: His Waiting Arms
